title: A2UI Common Types
description: Common type definitions used across A2UI schemas.

stringOrPath.description: Represents a value that can be either a literal string or a path to a value in the data model.

numberOrPath.description: Represents a value that can be either a literal number or a path to a value in the data model.

booleanOrPath.description: Represents a value that can be either a literal boolean or a path to a value in the data model.

stringArrayOrPath.description: Represents a value that can be either a literal array of strings or a path to a value in the data model.

id.description: The unique identifier for this component.

weight.description: The relative weight of this component within a Row or Column. This is similar to the CSS 'flex-grow' property.

contextValue.description: A value that can be a string, number, boolean, or a path to a value.

oneOf.description: A static list of child component IDs.
A template for generating a dynamic list of children from a data model list. The `componentId` is the component to use as a template.

path.description: The path to the list of component property objects in the data model.
